attributes.action: support Class Action against the UK banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Consumers have had enough and want the Prime Minister, House of Commons & OFT to support a Class Action against the UK banks for a refund of unfair and excessive bank charges what are detriment to the consumer as described in 
Regulation 5 (1) of the Unfair Terms in Consumer Contracts Regulations 1999 which reads:

“Unfair Terms
     5.  - (1) A contractual term which has not been individually negotiated shall be regarded as unfair if, contrary to the requirement of good faith, it causes a significant imbalance in the parties' rights and obligations arising under the contract, to the detriment of the consumer.”
